mapper.select: SELECT CONFIG_ID AS configId,TYPE_NAME AS typeName,LEAD_ID AS leadId FROM SUPERVERSION_CONFIG WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND FUN_INTE_ARRAY(LEAD_ID,#{accountId}) > 0

SELECT C.CONFIG_ID AS confingId,C.TYPE_NAME AS typeName, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=C.LEAD_ID) AS leadUserName, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SUPERVERSION S1 WHERE S1.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND S1.TYPE=C.CONFIG_ID) AS zsCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SUPERVERSION S2 WHERE S2.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND S2.TYPE=C.CONFIG_ID AND S2.STATUS='0') AS doinCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SUPERVERSION S3 WHERE S3.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND S3.TYPE=C.CONFIG_ID AND S3.STATUS='1') AS delayCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SUPERVERSION S4 WHERE S4.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND S4.TYPE=C.CONFIG_ID AND S4.STATUS='1') AS endCount FROM SUPERVERSION_CONFIG C WHERE C.ORG_ID=#{orgId}
